title: Help text wrong in key provider
body:
### Before reporting an issue

- [X] I have read and understood the above terms for submitting issues, and I understand that my issue may be closed without action if I do not follow them.

### Area

admin/ui

### Describe the bug

Go to realm settings --> Keys --> Edit provider

Help text for the name attribute says, `Name of the mapper`.  Should say, `Display name of provider when linked in admin console.`

### Version

main

### Regression

- [ ] The issue is a regression

### Expected behavior

See above

### Actual behavior

See above

### How to Reproduce?

See above

### Anything else?

_No response_
author: ssilvert

comments.body:
Due to the amount of issues reported by the community we are not able to prioritise resolving this issue at the moment.

If you are affected by this issue, upvote it by adding a :thumbsup: to the description. We would also welcome a contribution to fix the issue.
@edewit This one was fixed by you, so reassigning for backport.
